content: materials - 7 skeins of alchemy yarns temple 100% superfine superwash merino wool these colors from the top are lantern citrine silver moonstone platinum topaz and kai s goldfish - us 7 4 5 mm 24 or 32-inch circular needles 1 - a tapestry needle gauge 20 stitches and 40 row 20 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions approximately 26 inches x 28 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
